conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a heist movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: Of course, I'd be happy to recommend some heist movies based on your preferences! If you're in the mood for an action-packed and exciting film, I would recommend "Takers" starring Chris Brown and Matt Dillon. The movie follows a group of bank robbers who are interrupted by a hard-boiled detective, leading to a thrilling chase. Alternatively, if you're interested in a more unique and quirky take on the heist genre, "Foolproof" starring Kristin Booth and David Hewlett might be up your alley. It follows a theoretical group of thieves who are blackmailed into pulling off a real heist, leading to a series of unexpected twists and turns.
